titles.title: Program to Inspire Growth and Guarantee Youth Budgeting Advice and Necessary Knowledge Act
A bill to establish a youth savings match grant program for students in grades 9 through 12.
PIGGY BANK Act
Program to Inspire Growth and Guarantee Youth Budgeting Advice and Necessary Knowledge Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
PIGGY BANK Act or the Program to Inspire Growth and Guarantee Youth Budgeting Advice and Necessary Knowledge Act
This bill requires the Department of Education to establish a pilot program for local educational agencies to carry out youth savings match programs for students in grades 9-12.
